alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Jo Daviess; Rock Island; Stephenson; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 16 at 9:48AM CST until February 16 at 9:00PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Illinois and east central, northeast and southeast Iowa. * WHEN...Until 9 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. North winds gusting up to 35 MPH will cause blowing and drifting snow, especially in open and rural areas. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Jo Daviess; Rock Island; Stephenson; Whiteside
